text.tspan: I am I and my environment
- Tends to an equilibrium to common institutions/ideas
- This equilibirum can differ for different initial conditions
- Different initial conditions are associated with institutions (countries, regions)
- Polarization or assimilation can occur between countries. Depending their connectness and similarity (Small Worlds and Cultural Polarization)
- Polarization if homophily (why to talk with an Ajax fan). Most papers ignore this. Crazy
- Assimilation if influence of your peers (ok, I'll support Ajax if I'm in A'dam)
* If within cluster way more similar than between clusters, more change of polarizatoni. More opinion dimensions reduce polarization.
All based on: They examine theirselfs (I) and their
network neighborhood (environment) and decide what to do.
